name: Kasidate Phlaiphueak
subtitle: Loves to learn new things.
about: I am a software engineer with a passion for learning and exploring new technologies. I have experience in various programming languages and frameworks, and I enjoy working on challenging projects that push my skills to the limit. In my free time, I like to read books, play video games, and spend time with my family and friends.

I am always looking for new opportunities to grow and develop my skills, and I am excited to see where my career will take me in the future. I believe that continuous learning is key to success in the tech industry, and I am committed to staying up-to-date with the latest trends and technologies.

I am a team player who enjoys collaborating with others to achieve common goals. I believe that effective communication and teamwork are essential for success in any project, and I strive to foster a positive and productive work environment.

experiences.title: Chatbot Developer Intern - AmitySolutions
experiences.description: I am worked as a chatbot developer intern at AmitySolutions, where I am responsible for developing and maintaining chatbots for various clients. My role involves collaborating with cross-functional teams to gather requirements, design chatbot flows, and implement features using various technologies. I am also involved in testing and debugging chatbots to ensure they meet client expectations.

experiences.title: Software Engineer Intern - AmitySolutions
experiences.description: I worked as a software engineer intern at AmitySolutions, where I was involved in developing and maintaining web applications using various technologies. My role included collaborating with cross-functional teams to gather requirements, design user interfaces, and implement features. I also participated in testing and debugging applications to ensure they met client expectations.

projects.title: I'm Guide
projects.description: I'm Guide is a web application that provides users with a platform to create and share guides on various topics. The application allows users to create guides, add images and videos, and share them with others. Users can also browse and search for guides created by other users.

projects.title: SAS Anouncement System
projects.description: SAS Anouncement System is a web application that provides users with a platform to create and share announcements on various topics. The application allows users to create announcements, add images and videos, and share them with others. Users can also browse and search for announcements created by other users.
